name: The Life Is Short, Walk On!
name_original: The Life Is Short, Walk On!
description:
This game is my expression of the feeling of understanding that life is realy short. I compare the life with the time for witch the match burns down. There is not much time to do something that you want.

In the game player shoud visit different locations to get education, work and so on. At the very begining match-indicator begins to burn. Player got just 30 seconds to make the life that he want. When 30 seconds pass obituary is presented. Game containes 20 different variations of obituaries depending which places you visited.

I hope this game will make player think about value of the time and motivate to do something great in life.

Controls: wasd-walk, mouse-look.
